QuestData.Title: Clear the Air
QuestData.Description:
Looks like Priscilla had a backup plan. Her goons set off some kind of smokescreen to cover her escape.
Clear out that smoke so the civilians can evacuate and we can secure the area!
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy $1oa Smoking Payloads in Unity Square.
QuestData.RewardText: <The last of the civilians escape to safety as the smoke clears.>
